728872f-a.title: Richmond: Front Street - Water Street
728872f-a.text:
Front Street, east side, at Water Street, showing the new Stapleton
station of the Staten Island Railroad.
August 23, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
728872f-a.folder: Front Street & Water Street, Staten Island, NY

728873f-a.title: Richmond: Front Street - Water Street
728873f-a.text:
(1)
Front Street (right), south from Water to Thompson Streets,
chowing temporary tracks of the Staten Island Railroad.
May 25, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, as viewed from Canal Street, one block farther south.
May 25, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
728873f-a.folder: Front Street & Water Street, Staten Island, NY
